title: As a Club User I want to see a Drug Test Requests widget
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing the Club's International Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN there is a new "Drug Test Requests" tab
AND on this tab there is a the new Club Drug Test Requests widget
AND the widget should follow the provided data discovery and wireframe
AND the widget should only show the viewing ORG's drug test request

title: As a BOC User I want to see a Drug Test Requests widget
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user is viewing the International Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN there is a new "Drug Test Requests" tab
AND on this tab there is the new BOC Drug Test Requests widget
AND the widget should follow the provided data discovery and wireframe

title: As a BOC Reg Analyst I want to see a Drug Test Requests widget
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user views the International Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN there is a new "Drug Test Requests" tab
AND on this tab there is the new Reg Analyst Drug Test Requests widget
AND the widget should follow the provided data discovery and wireframe

title: As a Club User I want to create a new Drug Test Request for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user click on the Create New icon on an International Amateur player profile
custom_expected:
THEN user will see the the new option "Drug Test Request"
AND selecting this item from the create new enu will launch a new Drug Test Request form for the selected player, with their information already pre-populated (including ebisid)
AND the user should be able to submit the form to the BOC after completing the required information
AND if the user chooses to "trash" the added player, it would work just as though they had created this from scratch from the widget

title: As a BOC Reg Analyst I want my Drug Test Request widget to only contain Requests Assigned to me
custom_steps: WHEN a Registration Analyst is viewing the Reg Analyst's drug test request widget
custom_expected: THEN the only requests that the analyst are able to see are those that have their username in the "Registration Analyst" field

title: As a BOC User I want to assign a Drug Test Request to a Registration Analyst
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the checkbox on a Drug Request row
custom_expected:
THEN the "Assign To" button will active (footer of widget)
AND clicking the button will launch a popover where the user can choose a Registration Analyst
AND a new stand alone permission will be created that can be added to individual ebis accounts
AND only users with this permission will appear as possible Registration Analysts
AND clicking the apply button within the popover will assign the request to specified analyst
AND the assigned requests will now appear on the appropriate analysts request widgets

title: As a Club User I want to submit a Drug Test Request for a player to the BOC
custom_steps: WHEN user adds a Player to the Drug Test Request Form
custom_expected:
THEN the "Submit to BOC" button is enabled
AND clicking the button will run a required field and format check per the provided data discovery
AND Once the required rule checks have passed, the form's status is updated to "Submitted"(club) and "Pending Review" (BOC)
AND the submitted form should show on the Club's Drug Test Request widget as "Submitted"
AND the submitted form should show on the BOC's Drug Test Request widget as Pending Review

title: As a Club User I want clicking Add Player on a new Drug Test Request to check if the player already exists in the system
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Add Player" on a Drug Test Request Form
custom_expected:
THEN the system should check to see if there is already a player profile entered for the information entered that the user has permission to see
AND this should re-use the existing logic that is checked on the Create New for an International Amateur profile for Club users
AND if a match is found, display the match(es) per the wireframe
AND the user should have the ability to pick any of the existing profiles OR to add the newly entered information as a "new" player by selecting the appropriate entry via radio button and clicking "Add Player"
AND the appropriate player's information will be added to the form and the user will have the opportunity to complete the form as usual
AND clicking Cancel will close the matching message and return the user to the for with no player added

title: As a Club User I want to see a Drug Test Requests widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the "Drug Test Requests" tab
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the new Club Drug Test Request widget
AND the widget should follow the provided data discovery and wireframe
AND the widget should only show the viewing ORG's drug test requests
AND IF the player has an ebis profile, the name columns will be a hyperlink to the player's profile
AND the status column will be a hyperlink to the Request Form in view mode

title: As a BOC Reg Analyst I want to see a Drug Test Requests widget
custom_steps: WHEN BOC User click on the Drug Test Request tab
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be able to view the new Reg Analyst Drug Test Requests widget
AND the widget should follow the provided data discovery and wireframe

title: As a BOC Reg Analyst I want my Drug Test Request widget to only contain Requests Assigned to me
custom_steps: WHEN a Registration Analyst is viewing the Reg Analyst's drug test request wiget
custom_expected: THEN the only requests that they are able to see are those that have their username in the "Registration Analyst" field

title: As a User, I want the Drug Test Request Widgets Updated
custom_preconds:
Wires:
BOC: https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_boc
Reg Analyst: https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_analyst
Club: https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_club

Data Discoveries:
BOC: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789987/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+Discovery
Reg Analyst: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3799155/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Reg+Analyst+-+Data+Discovery
Club: https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789983/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Club+-+Data+Discovery
custom_steps: WHEN "Boc/club/reg analysts" users are viewing the Drug Test Request widgets
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Test Date column added to all three Drug Test Request widgets
AND there will be a BOC comments bubble added to the BOC's Drug Test Request widget
AND this bubble will only be visible to BOC Users
AND this bubble will only be editable by BOC Users
AND there will be a Club Comments bubble added to all three Drug Test Request widgets
AND only BOC and Reg Analyst Users will be able to edit

title: As a BOC User I want to update the status of Drug Test Requests from the widget
custom_steps: WHEN BOC user is viewing the Drug Test Request widget
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an "Update Status" button as depicted in the wire
AND clicking the checkbox on a Drug Request's row will active the "Update Status" button in the footer of the widget
AND user may check multiple checkboxes
AND clicking the button will launch a popover where the user can choose a new status
AND Users may choose from ANY status
AND clicking the apply button within the popover will update the chosen requests to the specified status

title: As a Reg Analyst I want to update the status of Drug Test Requests from the widget
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the Reg Analyst's Drug Test Request widget
custom_expected:
THEN there will be an Update Status button as depicted in the wire
AND cLicking the checkbox on a Drug Test Request's row will activate the button
AND multiple checkboxes may be checked
AND clicking the button launch a popover where the user can choose a new status
AND Users may ONLY choose "Consent signed/test pending"
AND clicking the apply button within the popover will update the chosen requests to the specified status

title: As a Club User I want to create a new blank Drug Test Request
custom_steps: WHEN club user clicks "Create New" on the Drug Test Request widget
custom_expected:
THEN a blank Drug Test Request form will launch
AND User will only see the Add Player section until all required fields are filled
AND THEN the "Add Player" button is enabled
AND once the player has successfully been added to the form, the "Submit to BOC' Button is enabled and "add player" button greyed out

THEN the "Submit to BOC" button is enabled
AND clicking the button will run a required field and format check per the provided data discovery
AND once the required rules checks have passed, the form's status is updated to "Submitted" (club) and "Pending Review (BOC)
AND the submitted form should show on the Club's Drug Test Request widget as Submitted
AND the submitted for should show on the BOC's Drug Test Request widget as Pending Review

AND if a match is found, display the match(es) per the wireframe

AND clicking Cancel will close the matching message and return the user to the form with no player added

title: Drug Test Request PERMISSIONS
custom_steps: **New LDAP Groups:**ebis-widget-bocintldrugtestingebis-widget-reganalystintldrugtestingebis-widget-clubintldrugtesting**Role Assignments:****BOC:**ebis-widget-bocintldrugtesting -  ebis-intl-boc-drugtesting-admin-role - ebis-intl-boc-drugtesting-viewer-role**Reg Analysts:**ebis-widget-reganalystintldrugtesting - ebis-intl-boc-reganalysts-drugtesting-admin-role - ebis-intl-boc-reganalysts-drugtesting-viewer-role**Clubs:**ebis-widget-clubintldrugtesting - ebis-intl-club-drugtesting-admin-role - ebis-intl-club-drugtesting-viewer-role

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to edit a submitted Drug Test Request
custom_steps: Wireframe:https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=new_drug_test_requestData Discovery: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+Reg+Analyst+-+Data+DiscoveryAcceptance Criteria:  - An Edit button will be available anytime the form is in view mode if the viewing user has edit permissions - Clicking  Edit will reload the form in edit mode, where there will be a Save button and a Cancel button in place of the Edit button.  - Clicking Save will commit changes and reload the form in View mode. - Clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm they wish to discard their changes  - If they confirm the decision, their changes will be discarded and the form will reload in view mode  - If they do not confirm the decision, the user will be returned to the form and no action will be taken.

title: As a BOC User I want to Create a Profile for a Drug Test Request
custom_steps: Wireframe:https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=create_profileData Discovery: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discoveryhttps://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+DiscoveryAcceptance Criteria: - On the BOC's Drug Test Request widget, player's without ebis profiles will have a 'Create Profile' button in the ebisID column as depicted - Only Admin users will be able to click the button - Clicking the Create New Profile button will run intl ama match checks - If any matches are found, a matching modal will be returned - There will be a Create New Player button and a Cancel button on the modal - Clicking Cancel will close the modal and return the user to their entry point - Clicking Create New Player will load a new intl amateur player profile in edit mode - The new profile will be pre-populated with information from the Drug Test Request form  -- This includes all Player Info, Contact Info, and Trainer / Agent Info - The profile will be subject to all existing rules and will function like other registration profiles - The existing drug test request will be linked to the new profile

title: As a Reg Analyst User, I want to Create a Profile for a Drug Test Request
custom_steps: Wireframe:https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=create_profileData Discovery: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discoveryhttps://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+DiscoveryAcceptance Criteria: - On the Reg Analyst's Drug Test Request widget, player's without ebis profiles will have a 'Create Profile' button in the ebisID column as depicted - Only Admin users will be able to click the button - Clicking the Create New Profile button will run intl ama match checks - If any matches are found, a matching modal will be returned - There will be a Create New Player button and a Cancel button on the modal - Clicking Cancel will close the modal and return the user to their entry point - Clicking Create New Player will load a new intl amateur player profile in edit mode - The new profile will be pre-populated with information from the Drug Test Request form  -- This includes all Player Info, Contact Info, and Trainer / Agent Info - The profile will be subject to all existing rules and will function like other registration profiles - The existing drug test request will be linked to the new profile

title: As a BOC User I want to link an existing Profile to a Drug Test Request
custom_steps: Wireframe:https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=create_profileData Discovery: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discoveryhttps://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+DiscoveryAcceptance Criteria:  - If any matches are found, a matching modal will be returned - There will be a Link Request button on the modal  - Selecting a matching player will activate the button - Clicking the the button will link the request to the selected player and dismiss the modal - The widget will reload and the selected player's ebisID will be displayed - The player's name will also be a hyperlink the profile - Contact Info / Trainer Info will get moved to existing profile as a new origin

title: As a user I want any drug test requests to be moved to the new player ID during an international player merge
custom_steps: Wireframe:https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_clubAcceptance Criteria:  - Following the merger of two intl amateur profiles, any drug request Drug Test Requests (regardless of state) will be move to the new PlayerID - The new ID will be reflected in the ebis ID column of the 3 Drug Testing Widgets

title: Add Fields to Trainer profile
custom_steps: Data Discovery:https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=89347878AC:The following fields will be added to the Intl Trainer/Agent profiles: - Partnership Program (checkbox) - Academy Name

title: As BOC Intl Drug Testing Admin User, I want updates made to the Drug Test Request widgets
custom_steps:
General:
 - Clean up spacing
  -- ID and Date columns can be tightened so they don't take up so much space

BOC Widget:
 - Move Request Turnaround column after Org Column
 - Results Reported column should show the TS the request status is update to Results Reported
  -- The column isn't currently populating with anything

title: As a BOC Intl Drug Testing Admin User, I want to be able to update key bio fields on a Drug Test Request
custom_steps:
AC:

* When a BOC Intl Drug Testing Admin is viewing a Drug Test Request, they will see an edit option
* When the Request is in edit mode, the following bio fields will be editable (in addition to fields already editable):
** First Name
** Last Name
** Birth Date
** Birth Country
** Birth Province
** Birth City
* Saving the form will commit changes made to these fields
* If the Admin user updates these fields to a match, they will see the matching player when clicking Create Profile and be able to successfully link the request to that profile
* These changes will flow through to link

title: As a Drug Testing User, I want Close buttons to return me to the Drug Test Request widget
custom_steps:
AC:

* After creating a new profile off of a drug test request, there will be a close button on the profile
* Clicking this close button will return the user to their entry point, the Drug Test Request widget
* Close button on Drug Test Requests should return the user to their entry point (which would most often be the Drug Test Request widget).

title: As a BOC Drug Testing User, I want an Org filter in the header of my Drug Test Request Widget
custom_steps:
Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789987/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+Discovery|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789987/Drug+Test+Request+Widget+-+BOC+-+Data+Discovery]

Wireframe: [https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_boc|https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=drug_test_requests_-_boc]

AC:

* There will be a new Org dropdown filter in the header of the BOCâ€™s Drug Test Request widget
* The filter will default to All Orgs
* Choosing a specific Org from this dropdown will filter the widget to only show requests submitted by the selected Org

title: As a Drug Testing User, I don't want National ID to be required for players (i.e. VZ)
custom_steps:
AC:

* National ID will not be required to create a Drug Test Request for players from Venezuela
* National ID will not be required to create a prospect profile off of a Drug Test Request for a player from Venezuela

title: Create additional Intl Ama Drug Test Request Permission and Map them to existing roles
custom_steps:
Create *ebis-intldrugtesting-editor* and map it to:

* *ebis-intl-boc-drugtesting-admin-role*
* *ebis-intl-boc-reganalysts-drugtesting-admin-role*
* *ebis-intl-club-drugtesting-admin-role*

Create *ebis-intldrugtesting-viewer* and map it to:

* *ebis-intl-boc-drugtesting-viewer-role*
* *ebis-intl-boc-reganalysts-drugtesting-viewer-role*
* *ebis-intl-club-drugtesting-viewer-role*

title: As a Intl Drug Testing Admin, I want to export all of the fields from a Drug Test Request for all Players in the DTR widget
custom_steps:
AC:

* On the BOCs Drug Test Request widget, there will be a new "Export" button
* Clicking the button will export the query provided into an Excel file.

title: As a Drug Testing User, I want the Drug Testing System (DTS) to Send Information to EBIS through a messaging queue
custom_steps:
EBIS will need to receive certain data points from DTS so the Drug Testing Admins can be up to speed on the progress of the test and notify clubs:


Reqs:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Testing+System+%28DTS%29+to+EBIS

AC
 - Set up the messaging queue
 - Set up a listener to process the request
 - Update the request in the database

title: As a Drug Testing User, I want EBIS to Send Request Information to the Drug Testing System (DTS) through a messaging Queue
custom_steps:
EBIS will need to send/make available certain data points to DTS so the Collector can locate the player and process the request:

Reqs:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=138959058

AC:
 - When the status of a Drug Test Request is updated to "Consent Signed / Test Pending" the messaging queue will fire and deliver the appropriate data points to DTS

title: As a Drug Testing User, I want the Drug Testing System (DTS) to Send Information to EBIS through a messaging queue
custom_steps: EBIS will need to receive certain data points from DTS so the Drug Testing Admins can be up to speed on the progress of the test and notify clubs:Reqs:https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Drug+Testing+System+%28DTS%29+to+EBISAC - Set up the messaging queue - Set up a listener to process the request - Update the request in the database

title: As a Drug Testing User, I want EBIS to Send Request Information to the Drug Testing System (DTS) through a messaging Queue
custom_steps: EBIS will need to send/make available certain data points to DTS so the Collector can locate the player and process the request:Reqs:https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=138959058AC: - When the status of a Drug Test Request is updated to "Consent Signed / Test Pending" the messaging queue will fire and deliver the appropriate data points to DTS

title: As a Drug Testing User, I want to see values in the Status & Dates section on Drug Test Requests
custom_steps: Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789986/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discovery|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/3789986/Drug+Test+Request+Form+-+Data+Discovery]AC:* When a Drug Test Request is Submitted to the BOC, the following fields will be populated:** Submitted to BOC** Submitted By* When a Drug Test Request is put into Consent Assigned state, the following fields will be populated:** Consent Assigned** Reg Analyst* When a Drug Test Request is updated to Consent Signed / Test Pending and is sent to DTS, the following fields will be updated:** Submitted to DTS** Submitted By* When a Drug Test Request updated to Results Reported, the following fields will be updated:** Results Reported** Results Reported By

title: As a BOC Intl Drug Testing Admin User, I want matching to fire if I update the bio fields on a Drug Test Request
custom_preconds: GiVEN user is viewing a Drug Test Request
custom_steps: WHEN BOC Admin user is editing a Drug Test Request
custom_expected:
THEN the key BIO fields will be editable
AND IF edits are made to these fields, matching logic will fire when the user clicks save
AND IF match is found, user will be able to select the already existing profile and link to request to that profile.
** this is the same flow and message as on the CREATE PROFILE button**
